2.1.36.name: wordpress/syntax-highlighter-and-code-prettifier
2.1.36.description:
This is a wordpress syntax highlighting plugin. It is simple and probably one of the best syntax highlighters in the market. This plugin integrates Alex Gorbatchev’s Syntax Highlighter Tool. Has Full Support for :

  • Bash/shell
  • C#
  • C++
  • CSS
  • Delphi
  • Diff
  • Groovy
  • JavaScript
  • Java
  • Perl
  • PHP
  • Plain Text
  • Python
  • Ruby
  • Scala
  • SQL
  • Visual Basic
  • XML
